name: NAO control
description: control a NAO robot (NAOqi 2.1) with your smartphone  supported features: - LEDs: switch on/off, change intensity, choose color - head: move head, show camera, speak any text - arms: move arms, elbows and hands, open/close hands - body: stand, sit, crouch, lying - walk and turn  three input methodes: - slider - joystick - multiple (allows you to control multiple features at the same time, e.g. head and walk) Control a robot NAO (Naoqi 2.1) with your smartphone  Supported features: - LEDs: switch on / off, change intensity, choose color - Head: Move head, show camera, speak any text - Arms: move arms, elbows and hands, open / close hands - Body: stand, sit, crouch, lying - Walk and Turn  Three input methodes: - Slider - joystick - Multiple (Allows you to control multiple features at the sametime, EC head and walk)
